meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #363.

div.div:
Beryl Arbit game 3.
(Number of champion's appearances estimated.)
Missing player introductions, first 5 clues, and Final Jeopardy.
Single-player Final Jeopardy!
Airdate approximate.

td.p: Karen Stevens, a lawyer from Los Angeles
Beryl Arbit, from Encino, California (whose 2-day cash winnings total $21,201)

tr.td: PRESIDENTIAL TRIVIA
AGES
STARTS WITH "D"
NONPOTENT POTABLES
WILD CATS
DISNEY

div.onmouseover:
toggle('clue_J_4_2', 'clue_J_4_2_stuck', '(Alberto: What is mineral water?)
(Alex: Mmm...be more specific.)
(Alberto: What is spring water.)
(Alex: Nope.)
---
(Alex: [*], that was the important element in the response, Alberto. Sorry.)
---
[Alberto is given credit for his response of "mineral water" going into Double Jeopardy!, however his score is "corrected" by $600, to $1400.]

sparkling water

BerylAlberto
')

div.onmouseover:
toggle('clue_DJ_5_5', 'clue_DJ_5_5_stuck', '(Alberto: What is "What Do You Get When You Fall In Love"?)
---
[NOTE: At the beginning of the round, Alberto is incorrectly given $600, rather than $400, when his response of "mineral water" is judged to have been acceptable. His actual wager on this DD is $2400; it has been entered here as $2200 to indicated that he has lost all his money at this point.]

"Promises, Promises" or "I\'ll Never Fall In Love Again"

Alberto
')
